archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.3a: a) measure the likely financial return, taking into account financial benefits (typically the cost of incidents) and the cost of security (typically the cost of security controls)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
